This is what i can do to get on top of my asthma... Start using preventer inhaler reguarly Take reliever puffs as needed (up to 3 puffs every 4 hours) If no improvement within 48 hours i should make an urgent appointment to see my GP or asthma nurse. PlaceHolder If you are struggling to sleep, take up to 3 reliever puffs every 4 hours. If you are struggling to talk, take up to 3 reliever puffs every 4 hours. If your peak flow has dropped significantly, take up to 3 reliever puffs every 4 hours.
